ND credit/lower credit, two (2) 'O' level credit passes 
in Biology/Agricultural Science and any other Science 
subject.   
Two (2) 'A' level passes in Biology 
/Zoology/Botany/Agricultural Science and any other 
Science subject.  
EDOMOK  acceptsin  addition  to 
 the  UTME requirements,  
NCE merit in Agricultural Science.  
'A’ level passes in any two (2) of the following: 
Agricultural Science, Chemistry, Physics, Botany, 
Zoology, Mathematics and Economics.  
ND credit in Agriculture or Animal Health from any 
Nigerian School of Agriculture.  
BOWEN accepts two (2) 'A' level passes to include 
Chemistry and any of the following Biology/Botany, 
Zoology/Agricultural Science, Economics, Physics and 
Geography/Physics.  
TASUED accepts two (2) ‘A’ level passes/NCE merit 
in Chemistry and one (1) of  
Biology/Botany/Agricultural Science,  
Economics,Physics, Geography and Geology 
/Mathematics (Pure and Applied).ND/HND upper 
credit in Agriculture or Animal Health from 
recognized institutions.  
CALABAR accepts   
NCE merit in Agricultural Education or Biology.  
HND pass in any field of Agriculture.  
ND creditin any field of Agriculture.  
'A’ level passes in Agricultural Science and any two 
(2) Science subjects including Chemistry.  
NCE pass in Agricultural Education or Biology 
and‘O’ level pass in Chemistry.  
NCE pass in Agricultural Education or Biology. 
Candidates in categories (a) and (b) must fulfill the 
three (3)'O’ level credit passes requirement 
including ‘O’level pass in Chemistry.  
IAUED – Same as in Fine and Applied Arts Education.  
NDU – Same as Vocational and Technical Education.
